messages.subject: Early bird registration for Enjoy Life ends in a  week!
messages.msgSnippet: If you are thinking of coming to the Enjoy Life Unschooling Conference this September, be aware that you have one more week to come for the cheapest price! The
messages.messageBody:
If you are thinking of coming to the Enjoy Life Unschooling Conference this
September, be aware that you have one more week to come for the cheapest
price! The early bird registration deadline is in a week so go ahead --
check out the web site and register! www.enjoylifeunschooling.com

We have about one hundred spaces left so grab 'em while they are hot!
REGISTRATION IS NOW OPEN!!!

Enjoy Life Unschooling Conference

21-22 September 2009
in Frederick, MD
at the beautiful Mar-Lu-Ridge Conference Center

Speakers include:

Danielle Conger
The Literacy Club:
One Unschooling Family¹s Journey Into Reading

Kelly Lovejoy
Live and LearnYour WHY TO Guide to Unschooling

Elissa Cleaveland
Letting Go and Letting THEM

Heather Burditt
Modeling is for Clay: Real Kids Need Real life

Zoa Conner
Becoming an Unschooler

Erika Davis-Pitre
Unschooling Diversity:
Would you like to be more welcoming?

and
TJ Phillips leading the SSUDs
Secret Society of Unschooling Dads! ~DADS ONLY

Funshops galore!
Hula hooping and hula hoop making
Button making
Video games
Bananagrams tournament
ATC trading card making
Making inspirational signs to assist your journey
Kiragami

Discussions including:
Unschooling Your Teens ­ Is It What You Expected?
Hosted by Erika Pitre-Davis

Careful What You Say, You are Always Listening
Hosted by Faith Void Taintor

Unschooling: How Does This Work?
Hosted by Melissa Johnson

Teen Panel and Chat
Hosts various teens and grown unschoolers

You Don¹t have to send Then in the World at Five
Hosted by Faith Void Taintor

can you think of more? Host a funshop!!!

We will also have a campfire with music, story telling and s'mores :-)

AND

An open mic coffee house live and recorded music, board games, crafts, your
special talent to share, coffee, tea, soda and more!!!


join our yahoo group
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EnjoyLifeUnschooling/

we are on twitter
http://twitter.com/NjoyLifeUnskuln

and facebook
http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1161919423&ref=profile#/group.php?gid
=109548068495
join us!!!


----------------
Zoa Conner, PhD
Physicist and Organic Learning Mother
